1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ¿mactxel eb chi je' cajay ec' bay a templo? ¿Mactxel chi je' yayji ec' bay a tzalan yet ayilal?</t>
2: <t>Asan mactxel ikem ayach, c'al watx' is yunben, tol k'anej yel chi yal yin masanil c'ul.</t>
3: <t>A mac c'am chi nawi aj k'anej, tamwal chi yetnej yamigo, tamwal chi yal k'umal eb cajan ec' c'atan.</t>
4: <t>A mac chi yintaknej el mac intaknebil el oj Mamin, palta chi tzaloj aj c'ul yin eb ay elapnok yul sat. A mac c'am chi q'uex is ti', chic'al yun tzet chi yala', caxc'al chi can yalan yuj.</t>
5: <t>A mac chi yak' tumin yin c'am yuca', cax c'am chi txon ba yin lek'ti' testigoal yin eb c'am is mul. A mac axca tu' is beybal, yel wal c'am bak'in ok ayc'ayok.</t>
